parameters.name: CertIds
parameters.description: The ID of the certificate. Separate multiple certificate IDs with commas (,). You can call the [ListUserCertificateOrder](~~455804~~) operation to obtain the IDs of certificates from the **CertificateId** parameter.

parameters.name: ContactIds
parameters.description: The ID of the contact. Separate multiple contact IDs with commas (,). You can call the [ListContact](~~2712221~~) operation to obtain the IDs of contacts from the **ContactId** parameter.

parameters.name: JobType
parameters.description:
The type of the deployment task.

Valid values:

*   cloud: multi-cloud deployment task.
*   user: cloud service deployment task. This type of task does not support cloud servers.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the deployment task.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the cloud resource. Separate multiple resource IDs with commas (,). You can call the [ListCloudResources](~~2712230~~) operation to obtain the IDs of cloud resources from the **Id** parameter.

parameters.name: ScheduleTime
parameters.description: The time when the task starts. The value is a UNIX timestamp. If you do not specify this parameter, the system immediately starts the task after the task is in the pending state.
